about_the_game:
Step into the mysterious and enchanting world of The Butterfly Effect, a story-driven adventure where choices shape the fate of two lives intertwined by magic.

Follow the journey of a young boy living in seclusion, whose life takes a dramatic turn after a fierce storm uncovers a peculiar mirror. What begins as a simple curiosity transforms into a heartfelt connection as the boy discovers the mirror's magical properties.

Experience the emotional journey as they navigate love, courage, and the unknown, culminating in a moment where their worlds collide, forever altering their destinies.

Prepare to explore a tale of love, mystery, and the butterfly effect of every decision you make.

Make story changing decisions that allow you to advance the story in many different ways and get a new ending each time you play.
